mapper.select: select distinct a.*, b.nickname, b.headicon from tb_letter a, tb_user b where a.acceptuserid = #{userid, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND b.id = a.senduserid AND a.mstatus != 1 and LOCATE(','+a.id, ( select deleteletter from tb_user where id = #{userid, jdbcType=INTEGER} )) = 0 ORDER BY a.sendtime DESC
